scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run start:watch" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.coverage: cd client && npm test -- --coverage --watchAll=false && codecov && cd ../server && npm test -- --coverage --watchAll=false && codecov
scripts.test: cd client && npm run test && cd ../server && npm test
